mapper.select: SELECT boardNum, SUBSTR(writedate,0,10) writedate, eventplace, event, approval, viewcount, userNick, status, editDate FROM (SELECT rownum rn, a1.* FROM (SELECT b1.* FROM (select b4.*, m.userNick from board b4 left outer join members m on b4.userId = m.userId) b1 order by b1.boardnum desc)a1)a2 WHERE rn BETWEEN #{minArticle} AND #{maxArticle}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board VALUES(board_seq.nextval, #{eventFrom}, #{eventTo}, #{eventPlace}, #{eventType}, #{event}, TO_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), '', #{eventDesc}, '',#{userId}, 0, 0, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET viewcount = viewcount+1 WHERE boardNum = #{boardNum}
mapper.select: SELECT eventPlace, event, eventType, eventFrom, eventTo, userId, writeDate, editDate, viewcount, eventDesc, adminMSG, approval, userNick FROM (select b4.*, m.userNick from board b4 left outer join members m on b4.userId = m.userId) WHERE boardNum = #{boardNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET eventFrom=#{eventFrom},eventTo=#{eventTo},eventPlace=#{eventPlace},eventType=#{eventType},event=#{event},eventDesc=#{eventDesc}, editDate=TO_char(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') WHERE boardNum=#{boardNum}
UPDATE board SET status='0' WHERE boardNum = #{boardNum}
